official_title: A bill declaring the Grand (Neosho) River above the town of Fort Gibson, Muskogee County, Okla., to be not navigable water of the United States.

summary.text: Declares the Grand (Neosho) River, Oklahoma, to be nonnavigable above Fort Gibson, Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill declaring the Grand (Neosho) River above the town of Fort Gibson, Muskogee County, Okla., to be not navigable water of the United States.
